description: Variation of reference: 20/03448/FUL	condition numbers 7 (roof structures), 18 (landscaping), 21 (replacement tree planting), 27 (green roof details) and 30 (urban green factor) to allow the change of wording of condition 7 and 27 to 'No construction works on top of the roof shall commence until' and condition 18, 21 and 30 to 'to become 'Prior to the commencement of soft landscaping works'.
